content: कार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कृ-घञ्] (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Making, doing, performing, working, maker, doer, author; ग्रंथकारः author; कुंभकारः, सुवर्णकार &c. &c. --रः {@--1@} Act, action; as in पुरुषकार. {@--2@} A term denoting a sound or a word which is not inflected; as अकार <ls>Ms. 2. 76</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">125</ls>; ककार, फूत्कार &c. {@--3@} Effort, exertion; <ls>Śi. 19. 27.</ls> {@--4@} Religious austerity. {@--5@} A husband, lord; master. {@--6@} Determination. {@--7@} Power, strength. {@--8@} A tax or toll. {@--9@} A heap of snow. {@--10@} The Himālaya mountain. {@--11@} Water produced by hail. {@--12@} Killing, slaughter.
